name: The Bat's Echo
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is a very early version of the game that WILL be updated, so be sure to watch for updates.

The Bat's Echo is a game about a bat finding his way through a deep dark cave, using his echolocation to find his way around!

Controls (Tutorial in-game):

D to move forward

W to jump

Space to shoot echos (lights up the surroundings), mouse to aim

Dodge your bullets (echos) and the stalactites and stalagmites

Slightly inspired by flappy bird
